text: Sara Schwartz, an editor for AARP magazine, is looking for writers who have covered music and/or musicians for a monthly series. I've pitched her before and she's lovely. And AARP pays well--I believe it was $2/word for the section I was pitching for. Sara said to email her if you fit the bill at <mailto:sschwartz@aarp.org|sschwartz@aarp.org>

text:
Hello Superpath!

I need your help! And it will only take 90 seconds of your valuable time.

My name is Michael Paulyn, I’m a remote digital marketing coordinator specializing in content creation.

I have been successful to date as a marketer by creating content creation processes and templates that have expedited campaign launches by weeks.

Plus, I have helped eCommerce businesses create targeted blog content to support an increase in organic search rankings.

I’ve learned that I work best in environments that are managed by establishing target objectives and outcomes. This has allowed my creativity to come alive and truly thrive.

I humbly request your help in finding a relevant marketing role opportunity, or even a warm connection across your network.

If you don’t have, or know of, any relevant marketing role opportunities, then I would greatly appreciate a like, comment, and share of this post for better reach and visibility across the feed of other marketers, recruiters and hiring managers.

Thank you so much for your time!
